secText:
Lesson:
1. Define [OBJ:expsec_v054:elements and atoms].
2. Describe the [OBJ:expsec_v055:plum pudding model] of the atom.
3. Describe Ernest Rutherford's [OBJ:expsec_v056:gold foil experiment] and his model of the atom.
4. Define [OBJ:expsec_v057:protons and neutrons].
5. Describe [OBJ:expsec_v058:isotopes].
